name: Katharsis (itch) (Daniil Chebotkov)
description:
Katarsis emerges you into the wolrd of unkown creatures that prevent our slime hero to persue his goal. Gather and use various abilities to evade opponents and triverse the environment to see what the slime can become!

Controls:

  • Use WASD to control the slime
  • Press Space to dash
  • Press Shift to stick

The game created for Indicator & NewArtSchool Game Jam

Game Engine - Game Maker
